item.title: Somatic variant interpretation
item.description: ## [1] ".GlobalEnv" "package:stats" "package:graphics" ## [4] "package:grDevices" "package:utils" "package:datasets" ## [7] "package:methods" "Autoloads" "package:base" I am a software engineer working in NGeneBio in Seoul, Korea. Most of my activities involve cancer data science, i.e.Â analysis of data from high-throughput molecular profiling of tumor samples. Main ongoing research activities: Cancer genome interpretation NGS Analysis pipeline Clinical software developement Cloud computing
